text: 13 Men and a Gun is a 1938 British-Italian war film directed by Mario Zampi and starring Arthur Wontner, Clifford Evans and Howard Marion-Crawford.BFI.org It is an English-language version of the Italian film Tredici uomini e un cannone. ==Premise== During the First World War, Russian forces attempt to take out an Austrian artillery position. ==Cast== * Arthur Wontner as Captain * Clifford Evans as Jorg * Howard Marion-Crawford as Kramer * Allan Jeayes as General Vloty * Gibb McLaughlin as Colonel Vlatin * Wally Patch as Hans * Scott Harold as Ludwig * Donald Gray as Johann * Bernard Miles as Schultz * André Morell as Kroty * John Kevan as Peder ==References== ==External links== * Category:1938 films Category:British films Category:British war films Category:Italian films Category:English-language films Category:World War I films set on the Eastern Front Category:British multilingual films Category:British black-and-white films Category:Italian black-and-white films Category:1930s war films Category:1938 multilingual films
title: 13 Men and a Gun
